# Unwavering Resolve
## Scripture
"Do not be conformed to this world, but be transformed by the renewal of your mind, that by testing you may discern what is the will of God, what is good and acceptable and perfect." â€“ Romans 12:2

## Reflection
As men, we often face challenges that test our resolve and push us to our limits. We may be tempted to conform to the world around us, giving in to its pressures and influences. However, as followers of Christ, we are called to be different. We are called to be transformed by the power of God's Word, to have our minds renewed and our wills aligned with His. This transformation is not a one-time event, but a ongoing process that requires us to be intentional and diligent in our pursuit of God. It requires us to be willing to stand out from the crowd, to be counter-cultural, and to trust in God's sovereignty.

As we face the challenges of life, let us remember that our resolve is not in ourselves, but in Christ. Let us fix our eyes on Him, and let His strength and courage be our guide.

## Daily Challenge
"Run 5 miles while declaring your trust in God's sovereignty."
